html:
{% if letter_head and not no_letterhead -%}
{{ letter_head }}
{% else %}

{{doc.name}}

{%- endif %}
{{ _("Employee Name") }} {% if doc.employee_name -%} {{doc.employee_name}} {% endif -%}
{{ _("Designation") }} {% if doc.designation -%} {{doc.designation}} {% endif -%}
{{ _("Circle") }} {% if doc.circle -%} {{doc.circle}} {% endif -%}
{{ _("Department") }} {% if doc.department -%} {{doc.department}} {% endif -%}
{{ _("Identity") }} {% if doc.identity -%} {{doc.identity}} {% endif -%}
{{ _("Specialization") }} {% if doc.specialization -%} {{doc.specialization}} {% endif -%}
{{ _("Material Status") }} {% if doc.marital_status -%} {{doc.marital_status}} {% endif -%}
{{ _("No of Children") }} {% if doc.no_of_children -%} {{doc.no_of_children}} {% endif -%}
{{ _("Date Of Joining") }} {% if doc.date_of_joining -%} {{doc.date_of_joining}} {% endif -%}
{{ _("Employement Type") }} {% if doc.employment_type -%} {{doc.employment_type}} {% endif -%}
{{ _("Category") }} {% if doc.grade_category -%} {{doc.grade_category}} {% endif -%}
{{ _("Grade") }} {% if doc.grade -%} {{doc.grade}} {% endif -%}
{{ _("Experience") }} {% if doc.experience_years -%} {{doc.experience_years}} {% endif -%}

{{ _("Earnings") }}

{% for ern in doc.get("earnings")%} {% endfor%}
{{_("Sr")}} {{_("Component")}} {{_("Amount")}}
{{ern.idx}} {{ern.salary_component}} {{ern.amount}}

{{ _("Deductions") }}

{% for ded in doc.get("deductions")%} {% endfor%}
{{_("Sr")}} {{_("Component")}} {{_("Amount")}}
{{ded.idx}} {{ded.salary_component}} {{ded.amount}}

{{_("Loans")}}

{% if doc.get("loans") %} {% for loan in doc.get('loans')%} {% endfor%} {% endif %}
{{_("Employee Loan")}} {{_("Total Payment")}}
{{loan.employee_loan}} {{loan.total_payment}}

{{_('Total')}}

{{_('Total Earnings')}} {{doc.gross_pay}}
{{_('Total Deduction')}} {{doc.total_deduction}}
{{_('Total Loan')}} {{doc.total_loan_repayment}}
{{_('Total Overtime')}} {{doc.total_overtime}}
{{_('Rounded Total')}} {{doc.rounded_total}}
Total {{doc.net_pay}}
Total in words {{doc.total_in_words}}
{% for att in doc.get('attendance')%} {% endfor %}
{{_('sr')}} {{_('Day')}} {{_('Total Hours')}} {{_('Status')}} {{_('Late Hours')}} {{_('Overtime')}} {{_('Early Depature')}} {{_('Exit Permition')}} {{_('Total Working')}}
